data.description: A Perl module for manipulating Apache config
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Parsing apache configuration file is often an administration task,
    so I think that the namespace "Admin" under the "Apache" rootlevel
    is justified.

    Another namespace would be something like Config::Apache, but I
    think that Apache::Admin::Config is already known by this name.
